overview:
Drew Garcia is the director of product management at TimeBridge where he is leading development of the company’s Personal Scheduling Assistant.

Prior to joining TimeBridge, Drew was the senior product manager of Yahoo Calendar, where he drove the roadmap for new calendaring initiatives, including integration between Yahoo Mail and Yahoo Messenger. While at Yahoo, Drew was also responsible for designing and implementing new features for web-based mail. Before Yahoo, Drew was a product line manager at Siebel Systems, and before that Drew worked at Netscape Communications, where he defined and negotiated international business agreements with partners to increase international adoption of Netscape’s browser and services. Drew was also a senior consultant with Accenture.
